Pause All Audio: This action can be used to pause all sounds currently playing, but this will not pause any sounds played after the action has been called. You can start them playing again using the action Resume All Audio.
The above action block code will check a global variable and if it evaluates to <tt>true</tt> then all sound is paused, otherwise it is all resumed.
